class.name: AccessDeniedException
class.javadoc:
Checked exception thrown when a file system operation is denied, typically due to a file permission or other access check.

This exception is not related to the {@link java.security.AccessControlException AccessControlException} or {@link SecurityException} thrown by access controllers or security managers when access to a file is denied. 1.7

Constructs an instance of this class.
filea string identifying the file or {@code null} if not known

Constructs an instance of this class.
filea string identifying the file or {@code null} if not known
othera string identifying the other file or {@code null} if not known
reasona reason message with additional information or {@code null}
